high_descs: Walk straight, then right to face the black desk at the other side of the room.
Pick up the remote in the middle.
Turn around then walk to the left to face the other side of the ottoman.
Place the remote on the ottoman.
Turn to the right and go straight to face the black desk.
Pick up the remote to the left.
Turn around then walk to the left to face the other side of the ottoman.
Place the remote on the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Place both remotes from the black table on the black ottoman.

high_descs: Turn left, turn right, move forward, and then turn left to face the table.
Pick up the keys from the table
Turn around and walk toward the couch
Set the keys on the couch
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the couch

high_descs: Walk forward left around the front side of the ottoman then turn right to face it
Pick up the keys from the ottoman
Turn right and walk to the small sofa
Put the keys down on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the sofa

high_descs: walk to the front of the foot rest in front of you
grab the keys off of the foot rest
turn around and walk over to the right side of the sofa
place the keys down on top of the sofa
tasks.task_desc: place the keys down on top of the sofa

high_descs: Turn around and move around the couch to the lounge chair at the opposite side of the room.
Pick up the left-most set of keys on the lounge chair.
Turn right and go to the purple couch.
Place the keys on the couch next to the couch pillow.
tasks.task_desc: Move the left-most set of keys from the lounge chair to the couch.

high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the white table then turn right and head to the blue chair.
Grab the keys on the back of the cushion of the chair.
Turn right and then left towards the blue couch with a striped pillow.
Set the keys on the couch next to the striped pillow.
tasks.task_desc: Move a set of keys to the blue couch.

high_descs: Turn around and go forward and then turn right and then turn to the right again to face the chair with two sets of keys on it.
Pick the  keys up that are near the back of the chair.
Go right and then turn to the left and face the chair with the round pillow.
Put the keys down on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys on a chair.

high_descs: Go left and then to the right and cross the room to face the shelves with keys and a statue on them.
Pick the keys up from the shelf.
Turn around and turn to face the couch with the yellow pillow on the right.
Put the keys on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys on a couch.

high_descs: Turn left, walk forward to the armchair, then turn right and walk forward across the room to the statue on the small shelf between the walls.
Pick up the key chain in front of the statue.
Turn around and walk forward to the sofa on the right.
Put the key chain on the seat of the sofa which is farthest away from the credit card.
tasks.task_desc: Move a key chain from a small shelf to a sofa.

high_descs: Turn left, step out of the corner and walk to living room shelves with a trophy on display.
Pick up the set of keys off the cabinet shelf.
Turn around and walk forward to the edge of the sofa, turn right to face the sofa corner.
Place the keys on the right edge of the sofa.
tasks.task_desc: Find keys and put on sofa.

high_descs: Make a left to reach the TV console.
Pick up the remote from the TV console.
Turn around to face the ottoman.
Put the remote on the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote to the ottoman.

high_descs: Move to the right side of the TV stand
Pick up the remote on top of the TV stand to the right
Carry the remote over to the purple chair ottoman next to the purple chair
Place the remote on top of the purple chair
tasks.task_desc: Carry a remote to the ottoman

high_descs: Turn right and walk across the room, then hang a right and walk to the black table with the television on it.
Pick up the remote off of the black table.
Turn left and walk forward, then hang a left and walk over to the foot stool.
Put the remote onto the front right corner of the foot stool.
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote to a foot stool.

high_descs: Turn around and walk forward to the dining table.
Pick up the remote control from the dining table.
Turn around and walk forward across the room to the ottoman by the armchair with the yellow pillow.
Put the remote control on the ottoman, to the right of the credit card.
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote control from a dining table to an ottoman.

high_descs: walk to face dining table
pick up remote from table
walk to face plush chair and ottoman
put remote on ottoman
tasks.task_desc: put remote on ottoman

high_descs: Turn around, move to the remote on the dining table.
Pick up the remote on the dining table.
Turn around, bring the remote to the ottoman.
Put the remote on the ottoman, right of the credit card.
tasks.task_desc: Put a remote on the ottoman.

high_descs: Walk around the couch to the chair left of the piano.
Pick up the credit card nearest the ottoman from the chair.
Turn left and approach the floor lamp by the sofa.
Turn on the floor lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Examine the credit card by light of the floor lamp.

high_descs: Walk to the ottoman in front of you
Grab the card from the chair
Turn around, walk towards the lamp with the card
Turn the lamp light on
tasks.task_desc: Turn the lamp light on to see the card

high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the door, then hang right and begin waking across the room, then hang another right and walk over to the right side of the chair with the keys and credit cards on it.
Pick up the credit card that is closest to the front of the chair.
Turn left and begin walking to the couch, then hang a left and walk over to the tall lamp.
Turn on the light of the tall lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Examine a credit card in the light of a tall lamp.

high_descs: Walk around the left side of the couch and turn to face it.
Pick up the plaid throw pillow laying on the couch
Turn to the left and walk to the foot stool in front of the chair on the right.
Place the plaid pillow on the foot stool.
tasks.task_desc: Place a throw pillow on the foot stool.

high_descs: Turn left, make a right at the front of the sofa on the right, and head toward the yellow pillow on that sofa.
Pick up the yellow pillow on the sofa.
Turn around, go straight, and make a right in front of the armchair with a laptop on it and a foot rest in front of it.
Place the yellow pillow on the foot rest.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up a pillow and place it on a foot rest.

high_descs: go around the couch to the front of it
pick up the plaid pillow that is on the left end of the couch
go to the chair opposite the couch with the ottoman in front of it
place the pillow on the ottoman
tasks.task_desc: Place a pillow on an ottoman

high_descs: Walk ahead and around the couch.
Pick up the yellow pillow on the couch.
Turn left and walk to the ottoman on the right.
Place the pillow on the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pillow on an ottoman.

high_descs: Move to the front of the couch.
Pick up the pillow from the couch.
Bring the pillow to the ottoman.
Place the pillow on the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Place the pillow on the ottoman.

high_descs: Walk around to the front of the sofa
Pick up the plaid pillow from the sofa
Turn left and walk to the ottoman in front of the chair
Put the pillow down on the ottoman
tasks.task_desc: Put the plaid pillow on the ottoman

high_descs: turn to the right and walk to the sofa with two cushions shaped like barrels
pick up the cushion on the left side of the couch near the green blanket
turn to the left and face the chair with the ottoman in front of it
place the cushion on the ottoman behind the remote control
tasks.task_desc: put a cushion on an ottoman

high_descs: turn right, walk to the sofa
grab the pillow on the left
turn around, walk to the ottoman
put the pillow on the ottoman
tasks.task_desc: move the pillow from sofa to the ottoman

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the couch.
Pick up the yellow pillow on the left side of the couch.
Turn around and walk to the ottoman on the right.
Place the pillow on the ottoman behind the remote control.
tasks.task_desc: Place a pillow on an ottoman.

high_descs: Turn around and veer left to walk to the couch.
Pick up the leftmost black and yellow cushion.
Turn left and walk to the ottoman.
Put the cushion on the ottoman behind the remote control.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cushion on an ottoman.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the sofa across the room.
Pick up the pillow on the left side of the sofa.
Turn around and move to the coffee table in the middle of the room.
Put the pillow down on the coffee table behind the remote.
tasks.task_desc: Place a pillow from the sofa on the coffee table.

high_descs: Turn around towards the left pillow on the couch.
Pick up the left pillow on the couch.
Turn around and walk towards the sofa chair on the right.
Place the pillow on the sofa stool to the top of the remote.
tasks.task_desc: Place the pillow from the big sofa on to the sofa stool.

high_descs: Move straight back to the largest brown sofa on the left side
Pick up the plaid cushion on top of the sofa to the left
Carry the plaid cushion over to the small brown chair ottoman
Place the plaid cushion on top of the ottoman
tasks.task_desc: Move a plaid cushion to the ottoman

high_descs: Go straight to the tv stand then turn right and go to the sofa
Pick up the striped cushion from the sofa
Turn around and go to the ottoman and turn right
Put the cushion on the ottoman
tasks.task_desc: Move the cushion from the sofa to the ottoman

high_descs: Walk forward, hanging a right when you reach the entertainment center, then walk up to the purple sofa.
Pick up the plaid pillow from the sofa.
Turn around, walk forward a few steps, then make a right to walk up to the ottoman.
Place the plaid pillow on the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Move the plaid pillow from the sofa to the ottoman.

high_descs: Walk ahead until you can turn right and walk to the couch.
Pick up the yellow pillow on the couch.
Turn left and face the ottoman.
Place the pillow on the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pillow on the ottoman.

high_descs: Walk towards the sofa chair, turn right, walk toward the yellow pillow on the sofa.
Pick up the pillow on the sofa.
Turn around, walk towards the tv stand, turn left to face the sofa chair.
Place the pillow on the sofa stool.
tasks.task_desc: Put the pillow on the sofa stool.

high_descs: turn right and walk to the TV, then take a right and walk over to the desk to the right of the piano against the wall
grab the keys out from the pull out drawers of the desk there
move to the right a bit and look up at the lamp against the wall
turn on the lamp against the wall
tasks.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding keys

high_descs: Turn right, go forward to the TV stand, turn right, go forward to the table between the lamp and the piano.
Take the keys from the drawer in the table.
Take a step to the right, lift the keys up.
Turn the lamp to the right on.
tasks.task_desc: Inspect keys near a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and go around the furniture to get to a side table with a drawer.
Open the drawer and take out the keys.
Step to the right and look up at the lamp.
Use the keys to turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Turn on a lamp with a set of keys.

high_descs: Turn around and move to the small black table along the wall.
Pick up the keys from the right side of the black table.
Hold the keys and take a step to the right.
Hold the keys and turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Hold a set of keys and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and then go a bit to the left and forward to stand in front of the black table with two sets of keys on it.
Pick up the keys on the right.
Move to the right to stand near the lamp on the right side of the black table.
Turn the lamp on.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up keys and turn the lamp on.

high_descs: Make a left, walk around the ottoman towards the piano, stopping at the black side table next to it.
Pick up the keys on the right on the black table.
Stand in front of the tall lamp next to the black table.
Turn on the tall lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Look at some keys under a tall lit lamp.

high_descs: walk over to the black sofa
grab a pillow off of the sofa
walk over to the leg rest in front of the chair
place the pillow on the leg rest
walk back over to the black sofa again
pick up the other pillow on the black sofa
then walk to the leg rest of the chair again
place the pillow on the leg rest
tasks.task_desc: place both pillows on top of the leg rest in front of the chair

high_descs: Go to the brown sofa on your left.
Pick up the yellow plaid pillow on the right cushion as you are facing the sofa.
Go to the chair and ottoman set on your left.
Place the yellow plaid pillow on the ottoman parallel to the short end of the ottoman, slightly right of center of the ottoman.
Turn to your right, go to the brown sofa.
Pick up the yellow plaid pillow on the left cushion of the sofa.
Turn to your left, go to the chair and ottoman set.
Place the yellow plaid pillow on the ottoman to the left and parallel to the first pillow.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up the pillows on the sofa, move them to the ottoman.

high_descs: Walks in the room,move left then right turns right in front of chair
Picks up the chair pillow from the chair
Turns left and walks up to the table
Drops pillow on the table
Moves left, then right, and turns right in between the chair and table
Picks up the pillow from the chair
Moves right then left and left again in front of the table
Places the pillow on the table
tasks.task_desc: The ro

high_descs: Move right to the chair against the wall with the keys on top of it
Pick up the keys on the chair
Carry the keys to the black end table against the wall
Place the keys in the left drawer of the end table, shut the drawer
tasks.task_desc: Move keys to a drawer

high_descs: Go forward and then turn left and face the chair with the keys and pillow on it.
Pick the keys up from the chair.
Turn around and face the black cabinet with the vase and statue on it.
Open the drawer and put the keys in.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys in a drawer.

high_descs: Walk to the tv stand then take a step to your right then take one step then turn right and walk past the ottoman then turn left and walk to the the black chair then turn left to face the space between the chair and ottoman.
Pick up the keys that are in front of you to the left of the pillow.
Turn left and take a step then turn left and walk to the small black table.
Open the drawer of the small black table and put it in the bottom left corner of the drawer before closing it again.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the coffee table in front of the chair with the laptop on it.
Pick up the key chain from the table.
Turn right and walk to the black table with two remote controls on it.
Put the keys in the drawer on the left hand side.
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the ottoman that's in front of you and stand facing it in the middle.
Pick up the keys that are in front of you.
Turn right and walk to the small black table against the wall.
Open the black table's drawer and put the keys in there then close it.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn around, move to the ottoman across the room.
Pick up the keys on the ottoman.
Turn right, bring the keys to the thin black table next to the lamp.
Open the drawer, put the keys in the drawer of the table.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys away in a drawer.

high_descs: Walk across the room, around the ottoman, to the black table on the far wall.
Pick up the keys that are on the black table.
Move to face the drawer within the black table.
Put the keys in the drawer within the black table.
tasks.task_desc: Move the keys from the top of the black table to the drawer inside.

high_descs: Walk across the room to face the black table.
Pick up the keys on the black table.
Take a step back to face the drawer in the black table.
Place the keys in the right drawer of the black table.
tasks.task_desc: To put some keys in the drawer of the table they are on.

high_descs: turn right, turn left, turn right, walk to table
pick up the keys that are on the table
move to the right one step
open drawer of table, put keys in, close drawer
tasks.task_desc: move keys from top of table to drawer

high_descs: Turn and go to the couch with the round yellow plaid pillow on it.
Pick up the remote that is to the right of the yellow plaid pillow.
Go to the chair that is to the right of the tv.
Place the remote on the front center of the chair.
Go to the couch where the round plaid pillow is.
Pick up the remote that is to the left of the pillow on the couch.
Turn around and go to the tv.  Turn right at the tv. Go to the chair and face it on the side.
Place the remote right behind the remote that is already on the cushion.
tasks.task_desc: Move remotes to chair.

high_descs: Go around the furniture to the small black table on the right side of the piano.
Pick up the remote on the table.
Turn around and go to the right side of the chair in front of the TV.
Place the remote on the chair's seat next to the cushion.
Go around the furniture towards to bookshelf across the living room.
Pick up the remote on the bookshelf.
Turn around and go back to right side of the chair in front of the TV.
Place the remote on the seat of the chair behind the cushion and the other remote.
tasks.task_desc: Put the remotes on the same chair.

high_descs: Go forward a bit, turn right, go forward a bit, turn left, go forward, turn right and go to the table
Pick up the vase on the table
Turn around, go to the wall, turn left, go forward, turn right, go forward, turn left at the couch, go forward a bit, turn right and go to the desk
Open the blinds on the window to the right
tasks.task_desc: Pick up a vase, open the blinds on the window

high_descs: Move forward, turn right, move forward, turn left, move forward, then turn right to face the dining table.
Pick up the vase nearest to you, on the dining table.
Turn around, turn left, go straight, turn right, go straight, turn left, then go straight to approach the lamp.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Look at a vase in the lamp light.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the dining table.
Pick up the vase on the table.
Go to the window.
Open the shades on the window.
tasks.task_desc: Open the shades on the window.
